title: President Donald J. Trump Announces Presidential Delegation to Attend the Funeral of His Excellency Jacques Chirac â€“ The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
September 28, 2019
President Donald J. Trump today announced the designation of a Presidential Delegation to France to attend the Funeral of His Excellency Jacques Chirac, President of the French Republic, 1995-2007, on September 30, 2019.The Honorable Jamie D. McCourt, U.S. Ambassador to the French Republic and Principality of Monaco, will lead the delegation.
